mapper.select: SELECT a.iboard, a.icategory, a.title, a.contents, b.nm, a.created_at createdAt FROM board a INNER JOIN user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE a.iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(icategory, iuser, title, contents) VALUES (#{icategory}, #{iuser}, ' ', ' ')
INSERT INTO board_pic(iboard, original_name, uuid_name) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{originalName}, #{uuidName})
INSERT INTO board_file(iboard, original_name, uuid_name) VALUES (#{iboard}, #{originalName}, #{uuidName})
mapper.select: SELECT itag, NAME FROM tag WHERE NAME LIKE('%${tag}%')
